Title: Dissolves the West Park union free school district, in the town of Esopus and county of Ulster; repealer
Summary: Dissolves the West Park union free school district, in the town of Esopus in the county of Ulster; provides for the payment of the debts and obligations of such school district.
LawCode: Rpld Chap 744 of 1973; amd ยง1, Chap 566 of 1967
ActClause: AN ACT to provide for the payment of the debts and obligations of the West Park union free school district in the town of Esopus in the county of Ulster; to amend chapter 566 of the laws of 1967 relating to providing for the apportionment of funds to certain special school districts, in relation to eliminating references to the West Park union free school district; and to repeal chapter 744 of the laws of 1973 relating to establishing and constituting as a separate union free school district certain territory in the town of Esopus in the county of Ulster, in relation thereto
